answers.answer: Oh, & it's my 3rd pregnancy,  and I'm 24 weeks
Nothing bad with that. If your body is asking for more there must be a reason why :)
I am the same way.  I'm 38 weeks  5 days.  My 8 year old daughter told me of I keep drinking so much water my water will break bc it will be too much lol.
Supposedly being constantly thirsty can be a symptom of gestational diabetes, but that doesn't necessarily mean you have that. You could just be thirsty lol.

question: So.. I am a big water drinker.  I don't like soda.  But.. all day today.  I can't get enough!  I've drank 13 , 16 Oz water bottles today.  And I can't get enough.  Is something wrong?
title: water water water?? help
